articles.author: Joe Williams
articles.title: Man Utd plan 'record-breaking transfer exodus' with Red Devils 'to accept' bid as Ratcliffe gets savage - Football365
articles.description: Man Utd are ready to make it a record-breaking summer of transfer departures and Donny van de Beek could be the first out, according to reports.
articles.content:
Man Utd are ready to make it a record-breaking summer of transfer departures and Donny van de Beek could be the first out, according to reports.
